description_html: Designed by Gio Ponti and produced for Altamira, the D.156.3 armchair is well-designed to provide both comfort and sophistication. Thanks to the exposed back support bands users can experience a flexible and relaxed sitting experience, while its sleek structure helps enhance any space with modern style and elegance. This piece is part of an exclusive reissuing project of furnishings designed by Gio Ponti in collaboration with Molteni&C to reintroduce Ponti’s signature designs to fit today’s modern lifestyles.
